notesStmt.note: A translation from a Latin translation of Erasmus Alber's Der barfuser Münche Alcoran, which is loosely based on the Liber conformitatum, attributed to Bartholomeus de Pisis.--STC.
Printer's initials from colophon; printer's actual name from STC.
